com.github.dandelion.core.html

Class HtmlTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.html.HtmlTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkTag, ScriptTag

    public abstract class HtmlTag
extends Object
    Abstract superclass for all HTML tags.
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau
